clauses.title: Termination
clauses.summary: 90 days notice period required for termination by either party.

clauses.title: Liability Cap
clauses.summary: Total liability limited to 12 months of fees paid.

clauses.title: Data Protection
clauses.summary: GDPR compliance required for all data processing activities.

clauses.title: Intellectual Property
clauses.summary: Customer retains ownership of their data and intellectual property.

clauses.title: Service Availability
clauses.summary: 99.9% uptime guarantee with SLA credits for downtime.

insights.message: Liability cap excludes data breach costs and regulatory fines.
Renewal auto-renews unless cancelled 60 days before expiry.
Force majeure clause may limit liability during unforeseen events.

evidence.snippet: Total liability limited to 12 months' fees paid under this Agreement.
Either party may terminate this Agreement with 90 days written notice.
This Agreement shall automatically renew for successive one-year terms.

clauses.title: Service Level
clauses.summary: 99.5% network availability with penalties for downtime.

clauses.title: Maintenance Windows
clauses.summary: Scheduled maintenance during off-peak hours only.

clauses.title: Security Requirements
clauses.summary: End-to-end encryption required for all data transmission.

insights.message: Penalty structure may not cover full business impact of outages.
Renewal terms include 15% price increase with no negotiation window.
Force majeure clause is overly broad and may limit recourse.

evidence.snippet: Service credits equal to 1% of monthly fee for each hour of downtime.
Renewal pricing subject to 15% annual increase.
Force majeure includes any event beyond reasonable control.

clauses.title: Data Residency
clauses.summary: Data must remain within specified geographic regions.

clauses.title: Backup Policy
clauses.summary: Daily automated backups with 30-day retention period.

clauses.title: Compliance
clauses.summary: SOC 2 Type II and ISO 27001 compliance required.

insights.message: Contract expired without auto-renewal, clean termination.
All data migration completed successfully before expiry.

evidence.snippet: Customer data shall be stored exclusively in US East region.
Contract expires on August 15, 2024 with no automatic renewal.
